ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Blob Survival is a small, chaotic game written in C and raylib, drawing inspiration from Vampire Survivors. It utilizes a quad-tree for efficient collision detection, enabling it to handle thousands of enemies. The game is contained within a single `game.c` file and features pixelated graphics, an upgrade system, and various enemy types.

SSHTron is a multiplayer lightcycle game accessible via SSH. Players connect to a server and control lightcycles using WASD or vim keybindings, competing against others in a digital arena. The game can be easily played on a public server or self-hosted using Go or Docker, offering a unique and accessible gaming experience.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Siyuan is a privacy-focused, self-hosted, and fully open-source personal knowledge management software. It allows users to create and manage their knowledge base locally, offering features like markdown support, Docker hosting, and WebDAV integration. The software is designed for individuals who prioritize data privacy and control over their personal knowledge.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Letta is a framework for building stateful agents with advanced reasoning and long-term memory. It provides tools for managing agent state, interacting with agents via REST API and SDKs, and a graphical Agent Development Environment. The framework is model-agnostic, allowing integration with various LLM API backends.

InvoiceShelf is an open-source invoicing solution that helps individuals and businesses track expenses, payments, and create professional invoices and estimates. It is a fork of Crater, focusing on stability, updates, and new features. The solution includes a web application built with Laravel and VueJS, and mobile apps built with React Native.

Kdenlive is a free and open-source video editor that provides professional-grade video editing capabilities. It is built on the MLT Framework and KDE Frameworks, utilizing technologies like frei0r and LADSPA for video and audio effects. The primary use case is for creating and editing videos, ranging from simple home videos to complex projects.

This repository provides an Nginx Lua script designed to mitigate DDoS attacks. It features an 'I am Under Attack Mode' authentication page, IP and User-Agent whitelisting/blacklisting, and WAF capabilities to inspect various request components. Additionally, it offers caching, speed, and performance enhancements like query string manipulation and minification.
